title: Wrestling at the 1992 Summer Olympics – Men's freestyle 62 kg
text: The men's freestyle 62 kilograms at the <a href="1992%20Summer%20Olympics">1992 Summer Olympics</a> as part of the <a href="Wrestling%20at%20the%201992%20Summer%20Olympics">wrestling program</a> were held at the <a href="Institut%20Nacional%20d%27Educaci%C3%B3%20F%C3%ADsica%20de%20Catalunya">Institut Nacional d'Educació Física de Catalunya</a> from August 5 to August 7. The wrestlers are divided into 2 groups. The winner of each group decided by a double-elimination system.
